intro: Orthophytum lemei, commonly known as the Lemei Sword Fern, is a striking evergreen plant native to the humid forests of Brazil. It belongs to the family Bromeliaceae, which includes many epiphytic and terrestrial plants. The plant is characterized by its tall, sword-shaped leaves that can grow up to 2 meters in length, creating a dramatic visual impact. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires high humidity and well-draining soil to flourish. Orthophytum lemei is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in the right conditions.
